metadata.title: Lenny & Eva Butterfly Bracelet in Matte Fossil Jasper Beads, 6.5" Stretch Bracelets with Inspirational Message on Card
features: DESIGNED TO INSPIRE: Lenny & Eva was founded with a single purpose- to inspire you. This natural aquamarine butterfly charm size is .7"
PACKAGE ON STORY CARD: This bracelet features a butterfly charm, and the message reads, "Trust the magic of new beginnings."
IDEAL GIFT: A perfect gift choice for yourself, your mom or your friends.
MATERIALS: 6.5" stretches to fit most wrists, and 6mm matte fossil jasper beads.

PROUDLY MADE IN THE USA: Lenny & Eva is designed and handcrafted in Tennessee. Supporting Made in America is one of our brand pillars, and something weâ€™re incredibly passionate about. Each piece is made in our downtown warehouse in the small town of Baxter, TN.
description: Wear this bracelet as a reminder that there's beauty in the start of something. Featuring creamy fossil jasper beads and a natural gemstone butterfly charm, this bracelet arrives packaged on a giftable story card, with the message, "Trust the magic of new beginnings."

title: 8mm Simulated-Lapis Lazuli Sterling silver Cloisonne Enamel Butterfly Bracelet
